sect1.title: Update bugzilla
sect1.para: The final part of updating the book is to update bugzilla. This is usually as easy as going to LFS Bugzilla (), going to the bug and choosing Resolve bug, changing resolution to FIXED. Note that you should not then go back and CLOSE the bug. The person who closes the bug should be a different editor who has tested that what the bug is about has been fixed. Basically, it's our QA process.
A more detailed explanation on how to use Bugzilla can be found later. This is just the check-list (ie: don't forget to finish off with Bugzilla assuming you already know how to use it).
